name: Spectral Guardian
description: The Spectral Guardian is a ghostly figure bound to locations of past disgrace, known for its eerie presence in tombs and ruins.
memorable: It can instill fear in foes while tethered to a location, teleporting back if it strays too far.
goals: To protect its bound location from intruders and avenge its past disgrace.
relations: Often encountered with other undead or in locations tied to its past.
environment: Tombs, ruins, and places associated with its disgrace.
strengths: High Dexterity and Charisma enhance its evasiveness and fear-inducing capabilities.
weaknesses: Very low Strength limits its effectiveness in physical confrontations.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with spectral blades, dealing slashing and necrotic damage, and can instill fear.
most_powerful_ability: The Disgrace Bound ability restricts movement, anchoring it to a specific location.
senses: Blindsight up to 10 ft. allows it to detect nearby creatures without sight.
skills: High Dexterity saving throws provide effective evasion against physical attacks.
additional_information: Immunities to cold, necrotic, and poison damage.
Resistant to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Can pass through solid objects with Incorporeal Movement.
Spellcasting abilities focus on fear and manipulation.
Can reduce targets' hit point maximum by inflicting necrotic damage.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like Dancing Lights, Fog Cloud, and Minor Illusion at will; Fear and Slow three times a day; Arcane Hand once per day.
test_queries: haunting spectral protector with fear abilities
undead creature that instills fear and hinders
powerful undead that can teleport back home
